title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the correct answer of R''(45) = 0

1 point is earned for the reason that R''(45) = 0

R''(45) = 0 since R'(t) has a maximum at t = 45.
descriptions:
The student response earns none of the following points:

1 point is earned for the correct answer of R''(45) = 0

1 point is earned for the reason that R''(45) = 0

R''(45) = 0 since R'(t) has a maximum at t = 45.

The student response earns one of the following points:

1 point is earned for the correct answer of R''(45) = 0

1 point is earned for the reason that R''(45) = 0

R''(45) = 0 since R'(t) has a maximum at t = 45.

The student response earns two of the following points:

1 point is earned for the correct answer of R''(45) = 0

1 point is earned for the reason that R''(45) = 0

R''(45) = 0 since R'(t) has a maximum at t = 45.
